dc:description: Pitcher.  Free blown of transparent light blue-green glass.  Cylindrical body with nine vertical
dimples.  Cylindrical neck curving smoothly out of shoulder and into funnel mouth.  Rim turned out and under, tooled around inner edge.  Trailed handles attached at base of neck and folded
back against rim.  Thin trail of same colored glass wound five times around
neck under handle.  Bottom flat with kick, pontil and reamer marks.
Cf. Hayes #439 for general Syro-Palestinian type.
